title: Costigan's Needle
description: Naked and afraid, an entire community is drawn through a needle's eye into a wasteland of the far future! A strange new world awaits the terrified survivors of a spectacular crash through time. The citizens of an entire square block of a great city are uprooted from the only life they've ever know and cast into a timeless, wild landscape. Only the fittest are likely to survive unless out of their terror they can build an orderly new civilization.
author: Jerry Sohl
